Name: Erika
Description: Heal 50 damage from 1 of your Grass Pokemon.

Name: Misty
Description: Choose 1 of your Water Pokemon and flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, take a Water Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to that pokemon.

Name: Blaine
Description: During this turn, attacks used by your Ninetales, Rapidash or Magmar do +30 damage to your opponeny's Active Pokemon.

Name: Koga
Description: Put your Muk or Weezing in the Active Spot into your hand.

Name: Giovanni
Description: During this turn, attacks used by your Pokemon do +10 damage to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

Name: Brock
Description: Take a Rock Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to Golem or Onix.

Name: Sabrina
Description: Switch out your opponent's Active Pokemon to the Bench. Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokemon.)

Name: Lt. Surge
Description: Move all Electric Energy from your Benched Pokemon to your Raichu, Electrode or Electabuzz in the Active Spot.
